titleInfo.title: Bis-quaternary ammonium salts as phase transfer catalysts

mods.abstract: Bis-quaternary ammonium salts are used for the extraction of polyanions and show better extractive abilities than common phase transfer catalysts.

bibliographicCitation.ama: Lissel M, Feldman D, Nir M, Rabinovitz M. Bis-quaternary ammonium salts as phase transfer catalysts. Tetrahedron Letters. 1989;30(13):1683-1686.
